about_the_game:
Wake up in the future to a world with humanity on the brink of extinction. Discover the source of the radiation threatening the world and save civilization from a mysterious threat. This sandbox RPG features a gigantic world to explore, robust town building mechanics and a wide variety of items to craft!

Key Features

  • A gigantic world to explore, procedural generation creates overlapping regions and you can even travel to different planets!

  • A large amount of items to craft and find. Objects can be interacted with and used by other NPCs.

  • Advanced town building features. Add buildings and assign them roles such as Blacksmith, Hospital, Forester and more!

  • Rescue NPCs and add them to your town. They will perform tasks for you based upon their building's role.

  • Dynamic day/night cycle. Different enemies may come out at night and NPCs will rest in their beds depending on their work hours. Even the seasons change in some regions!

  • 4 Person Multiplayer - Have your friends join to build your towns and fight a variety of epic bosses.

  • Automation - Link machines together with tubes and conveyer belts to create advanced recipes.

  • RPG Leveling System - Level up as you explore, fight mutants and complete quests. Tailor your build by spending skill points and specialize in melee, ranged, energy or minions.

content_descriptors.notes: Some blood effects and mild gore is present in the game. No nudity or sexual topics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 compatible 2.3GHz or faster processor (Intel 2nd generation core i-series or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB NVIDIA GeForce 6800 series or ATI Radeon X800 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 16-bit sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 compatible 3.2GHz or faster processor (Intel 4th generation core i-series or better)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5GB NVIDIA GeForce 500 series or ATI Radeon 6000 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
